comment.body:
zeronet is cool. it does what it does really well, and has an elegant simplicity.  looking forward to testing the upcoming "social" features, i have a feeling that will lead to another bump in adoption.

big challenges will be of course some kind of Android and iOS accessibility, and user interface for non-coders. the use of proxies could expand the reach of content hosted within zeronet, and serve as a kind of "gateway" into zeronet from the old web.

a bigger dev community will be needed.....!!!
somebody give this man some fish already....
